attr.title: Missile Dancer
attr.desc: This is a vertical scroll shooting game. You can operate the fighter MissileDancer which implements lock-on missiles.
attr.desc_md: This is a vertical scroll shooting game. You can operate the fighter MissileDancer which implements lock-on missiles. The cursor for lock-on is displayed above your plane. While pushing the shot, the cursor zooms in. You can lock-on by matching the cursor with enemies. The range of cursor and the number of lock-on increases by taking the power-up item.
attr.inst: Copy data.win and all ogg files contained in the game folder to gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Copy data.win and all ogg files contained in the game folder to gamedata folder.
